1.text: Place your loom down with the red arrow facing away from you.

2.text: Wrap a red band from the first middle pin to the outside pin.

3.text: Connect a yellow band from the right outside pin to the closest middle pin.

4.text: Stretch a red band from the middle pin to the closest right outside pin.

5.text: Connect the right outside pin to the closest middle pin with a yellow band.

6.text: Continue attaching your bands in a zigzag pattern while alternating colors.

7.text: Turn the loom so that the red arrow points toward you.

8.text: Loop the yellow band on the middle pin over the closest pin on the left.

9.text: Loop the red band on the left pin over the closet middle pin to the right.

10.text: Continue looping your bands until you've done them all.

11.text: Remove the bracelet from the loom and connect each free end with a c-clip.

12.text: Wrap an orange band around your ring and middle fingers.

13.text: Twist 1 side of the band to make an 8.

14.text: Wrap 2 purple bands around your ring and middle fingers.

15.text: Pull the loops of the 8-shaped orange band over the 2 purple bands.

16.text: Wrap another purple band along the tips of your fingers.

17.text: Pull the loops of the bottom band over bands above it.

18.text: Continue this process until you have the right length bracelet.

19.text: Connect the free ends of your band with a c-clip.
